titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of the 20th anniversary celebration of the Harris County Hospital District's Thomas Street Health Center, which coincides with World AIDS Day.
Supporting the goals and ideals of the 20th anniversary celebration of the Harris County Hospital District's Thomas Street Health Center, which coincides with World AIDS Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of the Harris County Hospital District's Thomas Street Health Center and recognizes the 20th anniversary of the Center's establishment; and (2) the development of a national AIDS strategy with clear goals and objectives to reduce new HIV infections, especially among vulnerable communities. Encourages national, state, and local media organizations to carry messages in support of World AIDS Day and the 20th anniversary celebration of the Center.
